title: Authorizes the town of North Hempstead to create a townwide environmental district to identify and fund the costs associated with landfill maintenance
summary: Authorizes the town of North Hempstead to create a townwide environmental improvement district to identify and fund the costs associated with landfill maintenance.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1270

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. SCHIMEL -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation  to  authorizing
         the  town  of  North  Hempstead  to  create  a  townwide environmental
         improvement district

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Section 2049-e of the public authorities law is amended by
    2  adding a new subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4. NOTWITHSTANDING THE PROVISIONS OF ANY OTHER LAW,  GENERAL,  SPECIAL
    4  OR LOCAL, THE TOWN BY RESOLUTION OF THE TOWN BOARD AFTER AT LEAST THIRTY
    5  DAYS  PUBLIC NOTICE AND A PUBLIC HEARING, IS HEREBY AUTHORIZED TO ESTAB-
    6  LISH A TOWNWIDE ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION AND GREEN PROJECT INITIATIVES
    7  IMPROVEMENT DISTRICT, ENCOMPASSING ALL REAL PROPERTY WITHIN  SUCH  TOWN,
    8  FOR  THE PURPOSES OF ASSISTING THE AUTHORITY IN FULFILLING ITS POWERS AS
    9  DESCRIBED IN SECTION TWO THOUSAND FORTY-NINE-D OF THIS ARTICLE AND MEET-
   10  ING OBLIGATIONS INCURRED IN THE TREATMENT, MANAGEMENT OR DISPOSAL OF THE
   11  TOWN POPULATION'S SOLID WASTE AND  ITS  BY-PRODUCTS,  AND  TO  UNDERTAKE
   12  OTHER  ENVIRONMENTAL  PROJECTS,  INCLUDING  BUT  NOT LIMITED TO, EROSION
   13  CONTROL, FLOOD MITIGATION AND REMEDIATION, SHORELINE PROTECTION, GROUND-
   14  WATER PROTECTION AND WETLANDS PRESERVATION. THE TOWN BOARD  SHALL  SERVE
   15  AS THE BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS OF SUCH DISTRICT.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01527-01-1
